name: Best Memory Match Game
description:
Educational yet playful way to train your memory by improving concentration, focus and reaction speed. It is easy to learn and simple to play. It is a complete family game which is well suited for all the ages. As per our observation, kids totally love it and it is great to watch them learn and get entertained at the same time. Beautiful & soothing graphics will keep children happy all the time. Regular brain exercise could be great to improve their cognitive skills. This game also makes kids familiar with the names and appearance of around 300+ objects featured in 30 exciting & unique categories.

Choose a category out of 30 exciting & unique ones. Match the same tiles to win.

Food, Transport, Birds, Animals, People, Alphabets, Numbers, Fruits, Flowers, Vegetables, Toys, Shapes, Gems, Cartoons, Monuments, Monsters, Sea life, Body parts, Colors, Clothing, Time, Household, Instruments, Sports, Space, Superheros, Emotions, Zodiac, Insects, Flags

There are 3 difficulty level :

Easy : To ramp you up
Medium : You can amaze yourself
Hard : To be Brainiac 

Provision to switch from unlimited time to limited one to make things more challenging. 
Provision to switch from unlimited moves to limited one to make things more challenging.
Provision to mute music, sound & pronunciation.
Provision to unlock Full Game with no ads which has access to all 30 categories.

This game also works in offline mode without internet connection at all.

Please leave us a feedback and let us know what you think about the game. Your feedback will play a big role in improving it's future updates. Enjoy !!!
